Dominion [startdom]: 2

Deep in the water-filled caverns of Agartha live many Olms. They can live to become very old and they never stop growing. Sometimes it happens that an Olm survives for hundreds of years and grows both huge and intelligent. The Ageless Olm has survived for much longer than that and is now powerful enough to claim godhood.
